ModMetaData.name: RimWorld Performance
ModMetaData.author: Xeinaemm
ModMetaData.description:
Functionality 1. Redesigned hauling, capable of handling tens of thousands of things at once. Hauling 12k things takes ~4 mins for 10 pawns. 2. Tick tweaks, that improve late game performance by reducing number of game operations.
Compatible mods: 1. Allow Tools - mod automatically adjust to haul urgently, no need for Haul+ 2. Combat Extended 3. Any Extended Storage mod
Incompatible mods: 1. Pick Up and Haul - similar idea, but PUAH isn't late game optimized or huge scale 2. Any mod that changes tick functionality 3. Any "smart" construction/deconstruction mod
Troubleshooting 1. Enable debug mode in Options/Mod Options/RimWorld Performance. 2. Extract player.log from Options/General/Log file folder and report it on GitHub. 3. Remember to disable debug mode aftewards.
Steam: GitHub:https://github.com/Xeinaemm/RimWorldPerformance
